body: I saw the 4th chapter, the blonde would probably seduced the boy and make the black hair raped or force her to become one like herself. The black guy i guess will be the one who do the deed and the boy most likely will be forced to watch.

The blonde girl is some kind of actor, the black haired girl is a classmate, none of them are his girlfriend so I don't think the ntr tag should be here.  I've read both the first and last chapters and there's no girlfriend mentioned.

Is the NTR tag due to the blonde chick?
Or is it that later the black haired girl is gonna get fucked. 
Or is it blonde chick steals the boy from black haired girl. 
I'm all in for the reverse NTR, just not for the black haired girl getting fucked.
Why is there a NTR tag？
